```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Hey Anu! ‚ù§Ô∏è</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Pacifico&family=Comic+Neue:wght@400;700&display=swap');
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Comic Neue', cursive;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #fce4ec, #f8bbd0);
            min-height: 100vh;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }
        
        .title-text {
            font-family: 'Pacifico', cursive;
        }
        
        .heart {
            position: absolute;
            pointer-events: none;
            animation: float 6s ease-in-out infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes float {
            0% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); }
            50% { transform: translateY(-20px) rotate(10deg); }
            100% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); }
        }
        
        .pulse {
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
            100% { transform: scale(1); }
        }
        
        .confetti {
            position: fixed;
            width: 10px;
            height: 10px;
            background-color: #f00;
            opacity: 0;
        }
        
        .proposal-box {
            transition: all 0.5s ease;
            transform-style: preserve-3d;
        }
    </style>
</head>

        <p>Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è, too many butterflies, and questionable web design skills</p>
    </footer>
    
    <script>
        // Create floating hearts
        function createHearts() {
            const container = document.getElementById('hearts-container');
            const colors = ['#ff6b6b', '#ff8787', '#f06595', '#cc5de8', '#748ffc'];
            
            for (let i = 0; i < 15; i++) {
                const heart = document.createElement('div');
                heart.className = 'heart';
                heart.innerHTML = '‚ù§Ô∏è';
                heart.style.color = colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)];
                heart.style.left = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                heart.style.top = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                heart.style.fontSize = `${Math.random() * 20 + 10}px`;
                heart.style.animationDuration = `${Math.random() * 10 + 5}s`;
                
                container.appendChild(heart);
            }
        }
        
        // Confetti effect
        function createConfetti() {
            const container = document.getElementById('hearts-container');
            const colors = ['#ff0000', '#00ff00', '#0000ff', '#ffff00', '#ff00ff', '#00ffff'];
            
            for (let i = 0; i < 150; i++) {
                const confetti = document.createElement('div');
                confetti.className = 'confetti';
                confetti.style.backgroundColor = colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)];
                confetti.style.left = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                confetti.style.top = `${Math.random() * 100}%`;
                confetti.style.width = `${Math.random() * 8 + 2}px`;
                confetti.style.height = `${Math.random() * 8 + 2}px`;
                confetti.style.transform = `rotate(${Math.random() * 360}deg)`;
                
                // Animation
                confetti.style.animation = `confetti-fall ${Math.random() * 3 + 2}s linear forwards`;
                confetti.style.opacity = '1';
                
                document.body.appendChild(confetti);
                
                // Remove after animation
                setTimeout(() => {
                    confetti.remove();
                }, 5000);
            }
            
            // Add CSS for animation
            const style = document.createElement('style');
            style.textContent = `
                @keyframes confetti-fall {
                    0% { transform: translateY(-100vh) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; }
                    100% { transform: translateY(100vh) rotate(360deg); opacity: 0; }
                }
            `;
            document.head.appendChild(style);
        }
        
        // Button interactions
        document.getElementById('yes-btn').addEventListener('click', function() {
            document.getElementById('success-message').classList.remove('hidden');
            document.getElementById('persuasion').classList.add('hidden');
            createConfetti();
            
            // Add celebration animation to the proposal box
            document.querySelector('.proposal-box').style.transform = 'scale(1.1)';
            setTimeout(() => {
                document.querySelector('.proposal-box').style.transform = 'scale(1)';
            }, 300);
        });
        
        document.getElementById('no-btn').addEventListener('mouseover', function() {
            // Make the "no" button move away
            this.style.transform = 'translateX(' + ((Math.random() > 0.5 ? 1 : -1) * (Math.random() * 100 + 50)) + 'px)';
            
            // Show persuasion message
            document.getElementById('persuasion').classList.remove('hidden');
        });
        
        document.getElementById('no-btn').addEventListener('click', function() {
            // Make it even harder to click no
            this.style.transform = 'translateX(' + ((Math.random() > 0.5 ? 1 : -1) * (Math.random() * 150 + 100)) + 'px)';
            
            // Play sad trombone sound
            const audio = new Audio('https://www.soundjay.com/communication/sounds/sad-trombone-01.mp3');
            audio.play();
        });
        
        document.getElementById('reconsider-btn').addEventListener('click', function() {
            // Reset the no button
            document.getElementById('no-btn').style.transform = 'none';
            document.getElementById('persuasion').classList.add('hidden');
        });
        
        // Initialize
        window.addEventListener('load', createHearts);
    </script>
</body>
</html>
```

This creative proposal website includes:

1. **Fun Interactive Elements**:
   - Floating hearts in the background
   - The "No" button moves away when you try to click it
   - Confetti explosion when "Yes" is clicked

2. **Humorous Content**:
   - Scientific "evidence" for why you should date
   - Funny perks of dating you (priority WhatsApp replies, first dibs on snacks)
   - Legal disclaimer about what clicking "Yes" means

3. **Visual Appeal**:
   - Gradient background and pink/purple color scheme
   - Animated pulse effect on the main card
   - Responsive design that works on all devices
   - Placeholder romantic background images

4. **Playful Features**:
   - Sad trombone sound if they try to click "No"
   - Persuasive messages that appear when hovering "No"
   - Code snippet showing what happens if they say yes

The site maintains a fun, lighthearted tone while still conveying your romantic feelings. All elements are contained in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JavaScript.<ÔΩúend‚ñÅof‚ñÅsentenceÔΩú>

### ‚ú® **Anu's 3D Proposal Wonderland** ‚ú®  

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Anu, Let's 3D Date! ‚ù§Ô∏è</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/three.js/r128/three.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gsap@3.11.4/dist/gsap.min.js"></script>
    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Rubik+Bubbles&family=Quicksand:wght@500&display=swap');
        
        body {
            margin: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            font-family: 'Quicksand', sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffcce6, #ff99cc);
        }
        
        canvas { 
            display: block; 
        }
        
        #special-container {
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            z-index: 10;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        
        .title-text {
            font-family: 'Rubik Bubbles', cursive;
            text-shadow: 3px 3px 0 #ff99cc;
        }
        
        .floating {
            animation: floating 3s ease-in-out infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes floating {
            0% { transform: translateY(0px); }
            50% { transform: translateY(-20px); }
            100% { transform: translateY(0px); }
        }
        
        .rotating {
            animation: rotating 8s linear infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes rotating {
            0% { transform: rotate(0deg); }
            100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }
        
        .btn-dance {
            animation: dance 0.5s ease infinite alternate;
        }
        
        @keyframes dance {
            0% { transform: rotate(-5deg); }
            100% { transform: rotate(5deg); }
        }
        
        @keyframes rainbow {
            0% { color: #ff0000; }
            14% { color: #ff7f00; }
            28% { color: #ffff00; }
            42% { color: #00ff00; }
            57% { color: #0000ff; }
            71% { color: #4b0082; }
            85% { color: #9400d3; }
            100% { color: #ff0000; }
        }
        
        .rainbow-text {
            animation: rainbow 5s linear infinite;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- 3D THREE.JS SCENE -->
    <div id="scene-container"></div>
    
    <!-- UI OVERLAY -->
    <div id="ui">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-4 py-12 flex flex-col items-center min-h-screen justify-center text-center">
            <h1 class="title-text text-6xl mb-4 rainbow-text">Hey Anu!!</h1>
            
            <div class="bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-2xl max-w-2xl w-full mb-8 floating">
                <h2 class="title-text text-4xl mb-4 text-pink-600">Will you be my <span class="rotating">‚ù§Ô∏è</span> ?</h2>
                
                <div class="bg-gradient-to-r from-pink-100 to-purple-100 p-6 rounded-xl mb-6">
                    <p class="text-xl mb-4">I used Three.js to make this 3D just because‚Ä¶</p>
                    <p class="text-lg font-bold">üíñ You deserve more than a boring 2D proposal!</p>
                </div>
                
                <div class="grid grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-6">
                    <div class="bg-white/90 p-4 rounded-xl shadow">
                        <p class="text-sm font-bold text-pink-500">Pros if you say YES</p>
                        <ul class="text-left list-disc pl-5">
                            <li>3D cuddles > 2D cuddles</li>
                            <li>Can debug your life (jk I'm a mess)</li>
                            <li>We fit like JSON & API</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="bg-white/90 p-4 rounded-xl shadow">
                        <p class="text-sm font-bold text-purple-500">If you say NO</p>
                        <ul class="text-left list-disc pl-5">
                            <li>This website crashes üí•</li>
                            <li>I'll cry in React components</li>
                            <li>I'll haunt you in 3D</li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="flex justify-center space-x-6 mt-6">
                    <button id="yes-btn" class="btn-dance px-8 py-3 bg-gradient-to-r from-green-500 to-emerald-500 text-white font-bold rounded-full text-xl shadow-xl transition transform hover:scale-110 border-4 border-white">
                        YES! (Pretty Please ü•∫)
                    </button>
                    <button id="no-btn" class="px-8 py-3 bg-gradient-to-r from-red-500 to-pink-500 text-white font-bold rounded-full text-xl shadow-xl hover:animate-spin transition transform hover:scale-110 border-4 border-white">
                        NO (Try if you dare)
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div id="special-anu" class="hidden">
                <div class="bg-white/90 p-6 rounded-3xl shadow-lg floating">
                    <img src="https://placehold.co/800x400/purple/white?text=Anu+%3C3+Accepted+the+Proposal!!!" 
                         alt="Celebration image with Anu's name and hearts in 3D" 
                         class="rounded-xl mb-4">
                    <h3 class="title-text text-4xl text-pink-600 mb-4">WE DID IT! üéâ</h3>
                    <p class="text-xl text-gray-700">Prepare for the cutest 3D relationship ever!</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <script>
        // ------------- 3D SCENE -------------
        let scene, camera, renderer, particles;
        
        function init3D() {
            // Scene setup
            scene = new THREE.Scene();
            camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(75, window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight, 0.1, 1000);
            camera.position.z = 30;
            
            renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ antialias: true, alpha: true });
            renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight);
            document.getElementById('scene-container').appendChild(renderer.domElement);
            
            // Add floating hearts
            const heartGeometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(0.5, 16, 16);
            const heartMaterial = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ 
                color: 0xff3366,
                transparent: true,
                opacity: 0.8
            });
            
            particles = [];
            for (let i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
                const heart = new THREE.Mesh(heartGeometry, heartMaterial);
                heart.position.x = Math.random() * 100 - 50;
                heart.position.y = Math.random() * 100 - 50;
                heart.position.z = Math.random() * 50 - 25;
                heart.scale.set(0.5, 0.5, 0.5);
                scene.add(heart);
                particles.push(heart);
            }
            
            // Add big rotating heart in center
            const bigHeart = new THREE.Mesh(
                new THREE.SphereGeometry(3, 32, 32),
                new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({ 
                    color: 0xff0066,
                    wireframe: true
                })
            );
            scene.add(bigHeart);
            
            // Animation loop
            function animate() {
                requestAnimationFrame(animate);
                
                particles.forEach(particle => {
                    particle.rotation.x += 0.01;
                    particle.rotation.y += 0.01;
                    particle.position.y += Math.sin(Date.now() * 0.001) * 0.1;
                });
                
                bigHeart.rotation.x += 0.005;
                bigHeart.rotation.y += 0.01;
                
                renderer.render(scene, camera);
            }
            
            animate();
            
            window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
                camera.aspect = window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight;
                camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
                renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight);
            });
        }
        
        // ------------- INTERACTIONS -------------
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            init3D();
            
            const yesBtn = document.getElementById('yes-btn');
            const noBtn = document.getElementById('no-btn');
            const specialAnu = document.getElementById('special-anu');
            const ui = document.getElementById('ui');
            
            // YES button - victory scene!
            yesBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // Create explosions of hearts
                for (let i = 0; i < 50; i++) {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        createExplosion(
                            Math.random() * window.innerWidth, 
                            Math.random() * window.innerHeight,
                            ['‚ù§Ô∏è', 'üíñ', 'üíï', 'üíò']
                        );
                    }, i * 50);
                }
                
                // Hide buttons, show celebration
                document.querySelector('.btn-dance').classList.add('animate-ping');
                document.querySelector('.rotating').classList.add('text-6xl');
                
                setTimeout(() => {
                    ui.style.display = 'none';
                    specialAnu.classList.remove('hidden');
                    
                    // Change 3D scene to celebration mode
                    const bigHeart = scene.children.find(obj => obj.geometry instanceof THREE.SphereGeometry && obj.geometry.parameters.radius === 3);
                    if (bigHeart) {
                        bigHeart.material.color.setHex(0x00ff00);
                        bigHeart.material.wireframe = false;
                        gsap.to(bigHeart.scale, { 
                            x: 5, 
                            y: 5, 
                            z: 5, 
                            duration: 2, 
                            ease: 'elastic.out(1, 0.5)' 
                        });
                    }
                }, 1500);
                
                // Play celebration sound
                const audio = new Audio('https://www.soundjay.com/human/sounds/applause-01.mp3');
                audio.play();
            });
            
            // NO button - funny frustrations
            noBtn.addEventListener('mouseover', () => {
                // Make button run away
                const x = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 500;
                const y = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 200;
                gsap.to(noBtn, { 
                    x: x, 
                    y: y,
                    duration: 0.5,
                    ease: 'power2.out'
                });
                
                // Play error sound
                const audio = new Audio('https://www.soundjay.com/buttons/sounds/button-10.mp3');
                audio.play();
            });
            
            noBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // Dramatic 3D scene shake
                gsap.to(camera.position, {
                    z: 10,
                    duration: 0.5,
                    yoyo: true,
                    repeat: 5,
                    ease: 'power1.inOut'
                });
                
                // Turn scene red
                gsap.to(renderer.domElement, {
                    filter: 'hue-rotate(180deg)',
                    duration: 1
                });
                
                // Play sad sound
                const audio = new Audio('https://www.soundjay.com/communication/sounds/sad-trombone-01.mp3');
                audio.play();
                
                // Flash warning
                document.body.style.backgroundColor = '#ff4444';
                setTimeout(() => {
                    document.body.style.backgroundColor = '';
                }, 500);
            });
        });
        
        // Create floating emoji explosions
        function createExplosion(x, y, emojis) {
            const container = document.createElement('div');
            container.style.position = 'fixed';
            container.style.left = `${x}px`;
            container.style.top = `${y}px`;
            container.style.fontSize = '24px';
            container.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
            container.style.zIndex = '100';
            document.body.appendChild(container);
            
            for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                const emoji = document.createElement('div');
                emoji.textContent = emojis[Math.floor(Math.random() * emojis.length)];
                emoji.style.position = 'absolute';
                emoji.style.left = '0';
                emoji.style.top = '0';
                container.appendChild(emoji);
                
                const angle = Math.random() * Math.PI * 2;
                const distance = 50 + Math.random() * 50;
                const duration = 1 + Math.random() * 1;
                
                gsap.to(emoji, {
                    x: Math.cos(angle) * distance,
                    y: Math.sin(angle) * distance,
                    opacity: 0,
                    scale: 0,
                    duration: duration,
                    ease: 'power2.out',
                    onComplete: () => {
                        container.remove();
                    }
                });
            }
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>
```

---

### **Why This Rocks for Anu:**  

1. **3D Animations** üéÆ  
   - Floating hearts orbiting using **Three.js** (real 3D rendering!)  
   - Giant pulsing wireframe heart in the center  
   - Camera shakes if she clicks "NO"  

2. **Hilarious Interactions** ü§£  
   - "NO" button literally runs away when hovered  
   - If she clicks NO anyway, the **entire 3D world freaks out**  
   - "YES" triggers an explosion of emoji hearts  

3. **Over-the-Top Celebrations** üéâ  
   - Victory screen with applause sound  
   - The central heart grows huge and turns green  
   - Confetti-style emoji explosions  

4. **Funny Copy & UI** üó£Ô∏è  
   - _"Pros if you say YES: 3D cuddles > 2D cuddles"_  
   - _"If you say NO: I'll cry in React components"_  
   - All animated text, rainbow colors, and playful emojis  

---

**Try it yourself!** The 3D scene, physics-based button avoidance, and explosions make this unlike any proposal site Anu has seen.  

üí° **Bonus:** The wireframe heart in the center will turn solid green and grow when she says **YES!**  

Let me know if you'd like any tweaks! üòÑ
### YOU
Not nice create a more interactive and 3d animated with nice photos 
### BLACKBOX.AI

<SKIPPED_HTML_EDIT_MODE></SKIPPED_HTML_EDIT_MODE>
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">

    <title>Anu - The Ultimate 3D Love Experience</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com"></script>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/three.js/r128/three.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/gsap@3.11.4/dist/gsap.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/canvas-confetti@1.6.0/dist/confetti.browser.min.js"></script>
    <style>
        @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Dancing+Script:wght@700&family=Poppins:wght@400;700&display=swap');
        
        body {
            margin: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffcce6, #ff99cc);
            cursor: url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='24' height='24' viewBox='0 0 24 24'><path fill='%23ff3366' d='M12 21.35l-1.45-1.32C5.4 15.36 2 12.28 2 8.5 2 5.42 4.42 3 7.5 3c1.74 0 3.41.81 4.5 2.09C13.09 3.81 14.76 3 16.5 3 19.58 3 22 5.42 22 8.5c0 3.78-3.4 6.86-8.55 11.54L12 21.35z'/></svg>"), auto;
        }
        
        #scene-container {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        
        #ui-container {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 2;
            height: 100vh;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        
        .ui-content {
            pointer-events: all;
            background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-radius: 24px;
            padding: 2rem;
            box-shadow: 0 25px 50px -12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
            max-width: 600px;
            width: 90%;
            transition: all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.265, 1.55);
        }
        
        .title-text {
            font-family: 'Dancing Script', cursive;
            text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        
        .floating {
            animation: floating 3s ease-in-out infinite alternate;
        }
        
        @keyframes floating {
            0% { transform: translateY(0px); }
            100% { transform: translateY(-15px); }
        }
        
        .pulse {
            animation: pulse 2s infinite;
        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {
            0% { transform: scale(1); }
            50% { transform: scale(1.05); }
            100% { transform: scale(1); }
        }
        
        .photo-frame {
            border-radius: 16px;
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            border: 4px solid white;
        }
        
        .photo-frame:hover {
            transform: scale(1.05) rotate(2deg);
            box-shadow: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
        }
        
        #no-btn {
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- 3D Scene Container -->
    <div id="scene-container"></div>
    
    <!-- UI Container -->
    <div id="ui-container">
        <div id="main-ui" class="ui-content floating">
            <div class="text-center mb-8">
                <h1 class="title-text text-5xl md:text-6xl text-pink-600 mb-4">My Dearest Anu</h1>
                <p class="text-xl text-gray-700">I made this 3D world just to ask you...</p>
            </div>
            
            <div class="photo-frame mb-8 overflow-hidden">
                <img src="https://placehold.co/800x400/pink/white?text=Will+You+Be+Mine%3F" 
                     alt="Romantic sunset with heart-shaped clouds over a beach, text asking if you'll be mine"
                     class="w-full">
            </div>
            
            <div class="flex flex-col md:flex-row gap-4 justify-center mb-8">
                <div class="photo-frame flex-1 h-48">
                    <img src="https://placehold.co/600x400/purple/white?text=Our+Future+Together" 
                         alt="Digital illustration of a happy couple with cartoon hearts floating around them"
                         class="w-full h-full object-cover">
                </div>
                <div class="photo-frame flex-1 h-48">
                    <img src="https://placehold.co/600x400/blue/white?text=Endless+Adventures" 
                         alt="Digital painting of couple traveling the world with suitcase and map"
                         class="w-full h-full object-cover">
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="text-center mt-6 mb-8">
                <p class="text-lg mb-4">What do you say, Anu?</p>
                <div class="flex justify-center gap-4">
                    <button id="yes-btn" class="px-8 py-3 bg-gradient-to-r from-green-500 to-emerald-500 text-white font-bold rounded-full shadow-xl transform transition hover:scale-110">
                        YES! Let's Begin Our Story ‚ù§Ô∏è
                    </button>
                    <button id="no-btn" class="px-8 py-3 bg-gradient-to-r from-red-500 to-pink-500 text-white font-bold rounded-full shadow-xl">
                        No Thanks
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="text-sm text-center text-gray-500">
                <p>Disclaimer: Choosing "YES" will automatically upgrade your life to premium happiness mode</p>
            </div>
        </div>
        
        <div id="success-ui" class="ui-content hidden pulse" style="background-color: rgba(236, 253, 245, 0.95);">
            <div class="text-center">
                <h2 class="title-text text-4xl text-emerald-600 mb-6">YAY! You Said YES! üéâ</h2>
                
                <div class="photo-frame mb-6">
                    <img src="https://placehold.co/800x400/green/white?text=Congratulations%21+You+Just+Made+This+Guy+the+Happiest+Man+Alive" 
                         alt="Celebration image with fireworks and animated text displaying congratulations message"
                         class="w-full">
                </div>
                
                <p class="text-xl mb-4">Our 3D love story begins now!</p>
                <div class="grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4 mb-6">
                    <div class="photo-frame h-32">
                        <img src="https://placehold.co/300x300/green/white?text=Date+Nights" 
                             alt="Digital illustration of couple having romantic dinner under stars"
                             class="w-full h-full object-cover">
                    </div>
                    <div class="photo-frame h-32">
                        <img src="https://placehold.co/300x300/blue/white?text=Adventures" 
                             alt="Digital painting of couple hiking in mountains with backpacks"
                             class="w-full h-full object-cover">
                    </div>
                    <div class="photo-frame h-32">
                        <img src="https://placehold.co/300x300/pink/white?text=Laughter" 
                             alt="Digital illustration of couple laughing together on a couch"
                             class="w-full h-full object-cover">
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <button id="reset-btn" class="px-6 py-2 bg-gray-200 rounded-full text-gray-700 mt-4">
                    Back to Proposal
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    
    <script>
        // ============= 3D SCENE =============
        let scene, camera, renderer, particles = [];
        
        function init3DScene() {
            // Create scene
            scene = new THREE.Scene();
            scene.background = null; // Transparent background
            
            // Camera setup
            camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(40, window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight, 0.1, 1000);
            camera.position.z = 15;
            
            // Renderer
            renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ antialias: true, alpha: true });
            renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight);
            renderer.setPixelRatio(window.devicePixelRatio);
            document.getElementById('scene-container').appendChild(renderer.domElement);
            
            // Add ambient light
            const ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff, 0.5);
            scene.add(ambientLight);
            
            // Add directional light
            const directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.8);
            directionalLight.position.set(1, 1, 1);
            scene.add(directionalLight);
            
            // Create floating hearts
            createFloatingHearts(50);
            
            // Create central heart animation
            createCentralHeart();
            
            // Animation loop
            function animate() {
                requestAnimationFrame(animate);
                
                // Animate particles
                particles.forEach(particle => {
                    particle.mesh.rotation.x += 0.01;
                    particle.mesh.rotation.y += 0.01;
                    particle.mesh.position.y += Math.sin(Date.now() * 0.001 + particle.idx) * 0.05;
                });
                
                renderer.render(scene, camera);
            }
            
            animate();
            
            // Handle window resize
            window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
                camera.aspect = window.innerWidth / window.innerHeight;
                camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
                renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight);
            });
        }
        
        function createFloatingHearts(count) {
            const heartShape = new THREE.Shape();
            heartShape.moveTo(0, 0);
            heartShape.bezierCurveTo(0, 0, 0.5, 0.5, 1, 0);
            heartShape.bezierCurveTo(1.5, -0.5, 1.5, -1.5, 1, -2);
            heartShape.bezierCurveTo(0, -3, 0, -3, -1, -2);
            heartShape.bezierCurveTo(-1.5, -1.5, -1.5, -0.5, -1, 0);
            heartShape.bezierCurveTo(-0.5, 0.5, 0, 0, 0, 0);
            
            const extrudeSettings = {
                depth: 0.2,
                bevelEnabled: true,
                bevelThickness: 0.1,
                bevelSize: 0.1,
                bevelSegments: 3
            };
            
            const heartGeometry = new THREE.ExtrudeGeometry(heartShape, extrudeSettings);
            const colors = [0xff3366, 0xff0066, 0xcc0066, 0xff6699];
            
            for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
                const material = new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({
                    color: colors[Math.floor(Math.random() * colors.length)],
                    emissive: 0xff3366,
                    emissiveIntensity: 0.2,
                    specular: 0xffffff,
                    shininess: 50
                });
                
                const mesh = new THREE.Mesh(heartGeometry, material);
                
                // Random position and scale
                mesh.position.x = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 30;
                mesh.position.y = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 20;
                mesh.position.z = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 20;
                mesh.scale.set(0.2, 0.2, 0.2);
                
                // Random rotation
                mesh.rotation.x = Math.random() * Math.PI;
                mesh.rotation.y = Math.random() * Math.PI;
                mesh.rotation.z = Math.random() * Math.PI;
                
                scene.add(mesh);
                particles.push({ mesh, idx: i });
            }
        }
        
        function createCentralHeart() {
            const heartShape = new THREE.Shape();
            heartShape.moveTo(0, 0);
            heartShape.bezierCurveTo(0, 0, 1, 1, 2, 0);
            heartShape.bezierCurveTo(3, -1, 3, -3, 2, -4);
            heartShape.bezierCurveTo(0, -6, 0, -6, -2, -4);
            heartShape.bezierCurveTo(-3, -3, -3, -1, -2, 0);
            heartShape.bezierCurveTo(-1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0);
            
            const extrudeSettings = {
                depth: 0.5,
                bevelEnabled: true,
                bevelThickness: 0.3,
                bevelSize: 0.3,
                bevelSegments: 5
            };
            
            const geometry = new THREE.ExtrudeGeometry(heartShape, extrudeSettings);
            const material = new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({
                color: 0xff3366,
                emissive: 0xff0066,
                emissiveIntensity: 0.2,
                specular: 0xffffff,
                shininess: 30,
                transparent: true,
                opacity: 0.9
            });
            
            const heart = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material);
            heart.position.set(0, -2, 0);
            scene.add(heart);
            
            // Add animation
            gsap.to(heart.rotation, {
                y: Math.PI * 2,
                duration: 10,
                repeat: -1,
                ease: "none"
            });
            
            return heart;
        }
        
        // ============= INTERACTIONS =============
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            init3DScene();
            
            const yesBtn = document.getElementById('yes-btn');
            const noBtn = document.getElementById('no-btn');
            const resetBtn = document.getElementById('reset-btn');
            const mainUI = document.getElementById('main-ui');
            const successUI = document.getElementById('success-ui');
            
            // YES button - Celebration!
            yesBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                // Create confetti explosion
                confetti({
                    particleCount: 150,
                    spread: 70,
                    origin: { y: 0.6 }
                });
                
                // Animate UI transition
                gsap.to(mainUI, {
                    y: -50,
                    opacity: 0,
                    duration: 0.5,
                    onComplete: () => {
                        mainUI.classList.add('hidden');
                        successUI.classList.remove('hidden');
                        gsap.fromTo(successUI, 
                            { y: 50, opacity: 0 }, 
                            { y: 0, opacity: 1, duration: 0.8 }
                        );
                    }
                });
                
                // Change 3D scene colors
                particles.forEach(particle => {
                    gsap.to(particle.mesh.material.color, {
                        r: 0,
                        g: 0.8,
                        b: 0.2,
                        duration: 1
                    });
                });
                
                // Play celebration sound
                const audio = new Audio('https://www.soundjay.com/human/sounds/applause-03.mp3');
                audio.play();
            });
            
            // NO button - Funny frustration
            let noClicks = 0;
            noBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                noClicks++;
                
                if (noClicks <= 3) {
                    // Make button run away
                    const shakeAmount = noClicks * 5;
                    gsap.to(noBtn, {
                        x: (Math.random() - 0.5) * shakeAmount * 10,
                        y: (Math.random() - 0.5) * shakeAmount * 10,
                        rotation: (Math.random() - 0.5) * shakeAmount,
                        duration: 0.5,
                        ease: "elastic.out(1, 0.5)"
                    });
                    
                    // Change button text based on clicks
                    const messages = [
                        "Are you sure? üò¢",
                        "Really really sure? üíî",
                        "This is your last chance! üò≠",
                        "Ok, I'll go cry now"
                    ];
                    noBtn.textContent = messages[Math.min(noClicks, messages.length - 1)];
                    
                    // Play sad sound
                    const audio = new Audio('https://www.soundjay.com/buttons/sounds/button-09.mp3');
                    audio.volume = 0.5;
                    audio.play();
                } else {
                    // Final rejection effect
                    gsap.to(noBtn, {
                        scale: 0,
                        duration: 0.5,
                        onComplete: () => {
                            noBtn.style.display = 'none';
                        }
                    });
                    
                    // Shake the entire 3D scene
                    gsap.to(camera.position, {
                        z: 8,
                        y: -5,
                        duration: 0.2,
                        yoyo: true,
                        repeat: 5
                    });
                    
                    // Make all hearts fall
                    particles.forEach(particle => {
                        gsap.to(particle.mesh.position, {
                            y: -20,
                            duration: 3,
                            ease: "power1.in"
                        });
                    });
                    
                    // Play epic fail sound
                    const audio = new Audio('https://www.soundjay.com/communication/sounds/sad-trombone-01.mp3');
                    audio.play();
                }
            });
            
            // Reset button
            resetBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
                gsap.to(successUI, {
                    y: 50,
                    opacity: 0,
                    duration: 0.5,
                    onComplete: () => {
                        successUI.classList.add('hidden');
                        mainUI.classList.remove('hidden');
                        gsap.fromTo(mainUI, 
                            { y: -50, opacity: 0 }, 
                            { y: 0, opacity: 1, duration: 0.8 }
                        );
                        
                        // Reset no button
                        noClicks = 0;
                        noBtn.textContent = "No Thanks";
                        noBtn.style.display = 'block';
                        gsap.to(noBtn, {
                            x: 0,
                            y: 0,
                            rotation: 0,
                            scale: 1
                        });
                        
                        // Reset 3D scene
                        particles.forEach(particle => {
                            particle.mesh.position.y = (Math.random() - 0.5) * 20;
                            gsap.to(particle.mesh.material.color, {
                                r: 1,
                                g: 0.2,
                                b: 0.4,
                                duration: 1
                            });
                        });
                    }
                });
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>
```

### Key Features:

1. **Immersive 3D Environment**:
   - Floating 3D hearts with realistic Phong materials
   - Central animated heart that continuously rotates
   - Depth and lighting effects for realism

2. **Photo Gallery Elements**:
   - Multiple photo frames showcasing potential couple moments
   - Hover effects that make photos slightly rise and tilt
   - High-quality placeholder images that will be auto-generated

3. **Interactive Elements**:
   - "NO" button that gets increasingly dramatic on each click
   - Full celebration sequence with confetti when she says YES
   - Reset functionality to experience it again

4. **Visual Polish**:
   - Custom heart-shaped cursor
   - Smooth animations with GSAP
   - Glass-morphism UI elements
   - Responsive design for all devices

5. **Humorous Details**:
   - Escalating disappointment when clicking "NO"
   - Funny disclaimer about happiness upgrades
   - Celebration sequence with virtual applause

The 3D hearts use complex bezier curves for their shape and have realistic lighting effects. I've included placeholder images that will be automatically generated with AI based on the detailed alt text provided. The entire experience is wrapped in a romantic pink gradient background.
